reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 272/99: HEALTH SERVICES  RESTRUCTURING COMMISSION
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 272/99: HEALTH SERVICES  RESTRUCTURING COMMISSION
reg_info.act_under: Ministry of Health and Long-Term Care Act   Loi sur le ministère de la Santé et des Soins de longue durée

content.content: 1. The following are the duties of the Commission: 1. To advise the Minister on matters relating to the development and establishment of an effective and adequate health care system. 2. To advise the Minister on the issuance of directions in cases where the Commission issued a draft notice of intention to issue a direction, a notice of intention to issue a direction, a draft direction or a direction before March 13, 1999. O. Reg. 272/99, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following are the duties of the Commission:

1. To advise the Minister on matters relating to the development and establishment of an effective and adequate health care system.

2. To advise the Minister on the issuance of directions in cases where the Commission issued a draft notice of intention to issue a direction, a notice of intention to issue a direction, a draft direction or a direction before March 13, 1999. O. Reg. 272/99, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 272/99, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 272/99, s. 2.
